short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fastest note taker from within your browser. Start Jotting!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pre-note: The local memory is refreshed every time you update/re-install QuickJot. If you already have a previous version of QuickJot installed in your browser consider saving your jots to a note-taking app before updating to the latest QuickJot version. 

Have to take quick notes from a meeting? Or just want to jot down a quick thought? Jot it all with QuickJot.

A serverless note taker, QuickJot stores all your notes within your browser. Click on the QuickJot extension and start jotting down your meeting notes or thoughts. It's that simple with QuickJot.

Privacy: Click on the EYE icon on the top-right to hide your jots.
